execution.query: WITH MEMBER [Measures].[Reseller Order Count Divided by 7] AS [Measures].[Reseller Order Count]/7 SELECT [Measures].[Reseller Order Count Divided by 7] ON 0, EXCEPT({[Date].[Calendar Year].Children},{[Date].[Calendar Year].[CY 2010]}) ON 1 FROM [Adventure Works]

equalTo.query: SELECT 'CY 2005', 366.0/7 UNION ALL SELECT 'CY 2006', 1015.0/7 UNION ALL SELECT 'CY 2007', 1521.0/7 UNION ALL SELECT 'CY 2008', 894.0/7 UNION ALL SELECT 'CY 2009', NULL

execution.query: select [Measures].[Internet Order Count] on 0, [Date].[Date].Children on 1 from [Adventure Works]

equalTo.query: select [Measures].[Internet Order Count] on 0, [Date].[Date].Children on 1 from [Adventure Works]
